messages.subject: Hands on Healing classes offered by homeschooling family
messages.msgSnippet: Long time homeschooling parent Lisa Ferrer has agreed to offer her series of Reiki classes in my home! These classes are appropriate as an intro for beginners
messages.messageBody:
Long time homeschooling parent Lisa Ferrer has agreed to offer her
series of Reiki classes in my home! These classes are appropriate as
an intro for beginners ("Oh, wow! I can do this!") through
practitioners (should be able to practice healing arts by the end of
the class). Read Lisa's bio here
http://www.malayacenter.com/about/lisa-ferrer.html

A great experience for families to take together.

Class is limited to 8 students. Early bird discount for advance
payment one week before first class.
Please see the flyer below and feel free to email me or phone Lisa if
you have any questions.

I hope to see you there!


"Learn Reiki"
Classes for Children/Families
Homeschool/Unschool Group
*These classes are coordinated by and for homeschool/unschool adults
and children.

Location: Private Residence of Mary Currin, member of SF Homeschoolers,
in the Sunset neighborhood of San Francisco 94122

Classes for:
 Self-Healing
 Healing Others
 Certified Reiki Attunements
 Beginner through Practitioner Level

Class 1  Hand positions to distribute Reiki evenly throughout the body.
Class 2  Reiki Self-Healing. Body scanning of others for areas in
need of Reiki.
Class 3  Working with Reiki guides and Dowsing. Reiki on the
Environment.
Class 4  Sending Reiki through the eyes and Distance healing. Reiki
for Pets.
Class 5 - Reiki practice and Angel healing for stubborn issues.

Class prices

Series of 5 Classes prepaid, receive Certified Reiki
attunements thru 2nd degree FREE...$150
Prepaid at least 1 week prior to 1st class.......$125
Individual Class (if space available)..$30

*Payment by check, credit card or pay pal.

Certified Reiki Attunements available through 4th degree Master Teacher.

For each class wear comfy clothing & bring a pillow. Optional light
blanket & mat.

Schedule

Classes held in order 1-5 (above)
Thursdays at 12pm Feb 28  April 3 *no class 3/27.

Classes Coordinated by
Certified Reiki Master Teacher, Lisa Ferrer
Long time member of SF Homeschoolers and Bay Area Homeschool Field
Trip Groups

To Enroll Call
(925) 497-2529
